ModMetaData.name: Thing Limiter
ModMetaData.author: ilkeraktug
ModMetaData.description:
Enables storage units to have limitations on the number of things they can hold. How to use :
* Open storage settings and click on item label with specified mouse button in settings to open Limit Window. * Specify the limit for that item. * Type -1 to set unlimited.
Things to AVOID:
* Do NOT change language if you have any limit settings, otherwise all saved limit settings will be deleted.
For more settings, please check mod settings
